definition: all kinds of grass/all kinds of flora

sentences.english: Paraquat is an effective and widely used herbicide.
sentences.chinese: 百草枯是一種高效能除草劑。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical materials of 7 cases of paraquat poison were reviewed and analysed.
sentences.chinese: 方法對7例百草枯中毒患者臨牀資料進行回顧性分析。

sentences.english: This paper reviews possible role of transporters in paraquat resistance.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要綜述了轉運體在百草枯抗性中的可能作用。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical data of 42 patients with paraquat poisoning was analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性分析42例百草枯中毒患者的臨牀資料。

sentences.english: Conclusion Trinity is cure and nursing paraquat intoxication of patients with effective method.
sentences.chinese: 結論三位一體是救治及理百草枯中毒患者的有效方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study inhibition effect of Baicao Jiangzhiling on cholesterol biosynthesis in CHO cell.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討百草降脂靈對內源性膽固醇合成作用的影響。

sentences.english: The lung injury continued to develop after paraquat was completely eliminated in the rats.
sentences.chinese: 百草枯在肺內完全消除後，肺損傷仍可繼續發展。

sentences.english: Primogenitor hundred Cottage him are "beginning to taste a hundred herbs, Chinese medicine has only" in places.
sentences.chinese: 始祖百草堂是他“始嘗百草，始有醫藥”的地方。

sentences.english: Primogenitor hundred Cottage him are "beginning to taste a hundred herbs, Chinese medicine has only" in places.
sentences.chinese: 始祖百草堂是他“始嘗百草，始有醫藥”的地方。

sentences.english: Conclusion Paraquat is a pesticide with moderate toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 結論百草枯屬於中等毒性農藥。

sentences.english: Paraquat poisoning is no effective antidote.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚無百草枯中毒的有效解毒劑。

sentences.english: The crocodiles boated around in the lilies.

definition: Shennong or Farmer God (c. 2000 BC), first of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] and creator of agriculture
a book on Chinese (herbal) medicine/Chinese materia medica
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
prescription of elixir/potion of immortality/potion prescribed by an immortal
